name: Urbania: Create the future
blurb: Environmental awareness using social games where players are challenged to pursue sustainable development in the city of the future.

rewards.reward: A heartfelt thanks for your contribution; your name will appear on our Urbania credits page. You will also receive a free MP3 download of Urbania's main theme song.

You name will appear on the Urbania credits page and you will receive a unique virtual item identifying you as a VIP player. You will also receive a free MP3 download of Urbania\u2019s main theme song!

Your name will appear on the Urbania credits page and you will receive a unique virtual item identifying you as a VIP player. In addition, you will also receive a free MP3 download of Urbania\u2019s full chill out soundtrack!

All our great contributors at this level will have their name appear on the Urbania credits page, plus receive the following: a set of special bumper stickers, a unique virtual item identifying you as a VIP player, a free MP3 download of Urbania\u2019s full chill out soundtrack and Urbania art wallpaper for your PC or mobile device!

You will receive prominent mention on the Urbania credits page and receive a unique virtual item that identifying you as a VIP player. In addition a special wooden USB device loaded with exclusive Urbania wallpapers for your PC or mobile device along with the chill out soundtrack. At this level you also receive a T-Shirt with the Urbania logo and a special dedication from our team.

You will receive prominent mention on the Urbania credits page as a virtual co-founder and co-creator of "virtual worlds for a sustainable future\u201d. In addition you will also receive a unique virtual item that marks you as a VIP player, a wooden USB device loaded with exclusive wallpapers for your PC or mobile device along with the chill out soundtrack. Also included at this level is a set of collectible Urbania bumpers stickers, a patron T-Shirt with the Urbania game logo and a special dedication from our team, all packed in a beautiful organic cotton satchel!

You will receive prominent mention on the  Urbania credits page as a virtual co-founder and co-creator of "virtual worlds for a sustainable future". In addition, you will be awarded the very limited in game title of "Global Ambassador", which allows you to give players special awards and prizes that only ambassadors can donate. We will also build a virtual copy of your house based on any photo you send us for inclusion in the game. You will receive the original drawing signed by our artists too! Also included at this level is the following: a unique virtual building that is named after you or someone of your choice, a wooden USB device loaded with exclusive wallpapers for your PC or mobile device along with  the chill out soundtrack, a set of collectible Urbania bumper stickers, a patron T-Shirt with the Urbania game logo and a special dedication from our team, all packed in a beautiful organic cotton satchel and last but not least-our undying gratitude!
